name: Project Airlift
description:
Floods have made their lives hell. They are stranded on ground-level, with no way to go. Bad weather has made sure you have a tough time going higher.

Like a new piece of Turd on the crap mountain, the fuel is limited! How many can you save before your tank is empty?

Save people from dying. Before the fuel runs out. It's time for.......Airlift!
